summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PGY3-HUB Mind Mapping Tool Cytoscape.js implementation. CRITICAL ISSUES FOUND: Dashboard loads but shows JavaScript runtime errors and no UI elements are visible. Cytoscape.js is not properly initialized and edge creation is failing due to node ID format mismatches. The React Flow to Cytoscape.js conversion is incomplete.

ui_bugs.issue: Complete UI failure - no buttons, canvas, or controls visible after clicking 'Create New Map'
ui_bugs.description: Dashboard loads but renders no interactive elements. Users see a blank interface with no way to create nodes or interact with the mind map.

ui_bugs.issue: Cytoscape.js not initialized - window.cy is undefined
ui_bugs.error: Cytoscape not found in global scope
ui_bugs.description: Cytoscape.js library is not properly initialized, preventing any graph functionality

ui_bugs.issue: Edge creation failing with nonexistent source node IDs
ui_bugs.error: Can not create edge `edge-0` with nonexistant source `7f8ca947-0887-4794-8dd0-074f8b1be81c`
ui_bugs.description: Same issue as iteration 1 - edges are being created with node IDs that don't exist in Cytoscape, indicating data format conversion problems between React Flow and Cytoscape.js

integration_issues.flow: React Flow to Cytoscape.js data conversion
integration_issues.issue: Node ID format mismatch causing edge creation failures
integration_issues.description: The data conversion from React Flow format to Cytoscape.js format is not handling node IDs correctly, causing edges to reference non-existent nodes

integration_issues.issue: Complete UI rendering failure after navigation
integration_issues.description: After clicking 'Create New Map', the dashboard state loads but no UI components render

design_issues.issue: Dashboard shows blank interface with no user interaction possible
design_issues.description: Users cannot create nodes, view graphs, or access any mind mapping functionality

passed_tests: Home screen loads correctly with proper styling
'Create New Map' button is visible and clickable
Navigation from home to dashboard works
No JavaScript compilation errors preventing app loading
Backend communication appears functional (no 404s or network errors)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Complete the React Flow to Cytoscape.js conversion. Issues: 1) Fix node ID format conversion to prevent edge creation errors, 2) Ensure Cytoscape.js is properly initialized and exposed globally, 3) Fix dashboard UI rendering so Add buttons and canvas are visible, 4) Verify data structure compatibility between React Flow and Cytoscape.js formats. The conversion is partially complete but core functionality is broken.

success_percentage.backend: 100% - Backend appears to be working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 20% - Home screen works but dashboard is completely non-functional with critical JavaScript errors
